short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Extracts and collates links from web pages
short.de: Extrahiert und sortiert Links von Webseiten

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts all links from web page, sorts them, removes duplicates, and displays them in a new tab for copy and paste into other systems.
